nodes.text: Hyor-ka was a business owner who held the title of Master during the Imperial Era. By the time of the rebellion on Akiva, the proprietor owned a dao-ben steamed bun shop that was located in the Outer Rim planet Akiva's capital city of Myrra, one alley away from the junk dealer Temmin Wexley's spare parts shop. In 4 ABY, Wexley hid under the tarp of Master Hyor-ka's dao-ben steamed bun shop while spying on thugs working for the crime lord Surat Nuat.
Hyor-ka was first mentioned in Aftermath, a 2015 novel written by Chuck Wendig.
